Name: STRIKERS
About the game: STRIKERS is a fast-paced 2D local multiplayer fighting game where if you get hit once you lose. The game focuses on its quick pacing and interactions between different attacks/projectiles. Battle your friends to see who is a better fighter! This is an early version of a solo passion project with plans to improve upon its features, mechanics, and art style while adding more unique characters, maps, music, game modes, online multiplayer, and a single-player mode in the future. Right now the game consists of - 5 Fully playable characters - 11 Maps - 3 Songs - Team/infinite game-mode - Unique interactions between attacks - 'Clash' mechanic - Some playing as same character unique interactions. - Unique background creatures - Taunting With more coming soon The game requires at least 1 game controller to play
